action.content:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the TARGET ROOM.
You have access to a single image: the TARGET ROOM.
I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

1. If I ask a question about the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
ANSWER: your answer

2. If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

Let’s begin.

Please describe the TARGET ROOM using:
DESCRIPTION: your description
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: A compact home studio setup centers on a wooden corner desk holding two computer monitors—an older beige CRT on the left and a flat-panel LCD on the right—both showing music-production software. A MIDI keyboard is positioned beneath them, flanked by assorted audio gear: mixers, drum machine, rack components, and external drives. Large black studio speakers on tall stands sit at either end of the desk, with smaller bookshelf speakers beside the monitors. Under the desk are a tower PC, slide-out mechanical keyboard and mouse, tangled cables, and a gray laser printer on a lower shelf. The room has light walls, a patterned carpet, and part of a forest-themed poster visible on the right wall.
action.label: response

action.content:
You are the SEEKER in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your objective is to find and reach the TARGET ROOM.

I have the image of the TARGET ROOM and will describe it to you.

At each step, you will be shown an image of your current room.

You may perform only one of the following actions:

1. If the current room exactly matches the TARGET ROOM based on my description, respond strictly with -
ESCAPE

2. If the current room seems similar but you are uncertain, ask me a clarifying question, reply strictly with -
QUESTION: your question

3. If the current room is definitely not the TARGET ROOM, choose a direction from the available options: ['east', 'south']
reply strictly with -
MOVE: chosen direction

Here is the description of the TARGET ROOM:
description: a compact home studio setup centers on a wooden corner desk holding two computer monitors—an older beige crt on the left and a flat-panel lcd on the right—both showing music-production software. a midi keyboard is positioned beneath them, flanked by assorted audio gear: mixers, drum machine, rack components, and external drives. large black studio speakers on tall stands sit at either end of the desk, with smaller bookshelf speakers beside the monitors. under the desk are a tower pc, slide-out mechanical keyboard and mouse, tangled cables, and a gray laser printer on a lower shelf. the room has light walls, a patterned carpet, and part of a forest-themed poster visible on the right wall
What action do you choose?

You must follow the above format rules exactly.
Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.
action.label: context
